name: Cute can be broken
description:
You can spend a week "stroking"
It is a type of KENZEN game that you do not do.

■ Play time (assumed)
10 to 30 minutes per lap. There are 6 endings in all!
(10 types in total including endings with the same development)

■ The actual situation etc.
Welcome! (Super chat, etc. being delivered on YouTube is also okay)
If possible, it would be helpful if you could put the game title and URL in the video summary section.
